item.title: A successfull holiday - tips from our trip with our autistic son and neurotypical daugher
item.description: We spent the half-term break of May 2024 in a holiday village in Belgium, close to where some of our family live. It was fun! It was enjoyable! It was not as relaxing as a week on the shoreline basking in the sun and a good book, but it was fulfilling and nurturing for our family bonds.
